about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of art and inspiration! This unique artbook is a collection of colorful and memorable CG based on the world of Dark Fairy Fantasy.

It is a window into a world of imagination and creativity, where each image tells its own unique story. Discover the world of art and let it fill your life with bright colors and new emotions!

Features:

  • The collection of colorful CG
  • A chance to learn more about the universe of Dark Fairy Fantasy

After purchase, the artbook will be in the folder with the game:
C:\Program Files\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Dark Fairy Fantasy\artbook
